document.body:
A leading member of the CyberStars®, Linda DeVlieg, ABR, ePro, Cyberstar, has long been a market leader in Albuquerque due to her commitment to serving customers and clients and her use of technology to meet the needs of today’s consumer. DeVlieg’s emphasis on her real estate Web site as a top consumer resource and on using technology for effective communication and service has made her achieve over 100 Million Dollars in home sales
Monday, July 30, 2007
Home Prices Aren't Falling in Saturated Market
